body: // Place your snippets for csharp here. Each snippet is defined under a snippet name and has a prefix, body and
// description. The prefix is what is used to trigger the snippet and the body will be expanded and inserted. Possible variables are:
// \$1, \$2 for tab stops, \$0 for the final cursor position, and \${1:label}, \${2:another} for placeholders. Placeholders with the
// Place your snippets for csharp here. Each snippet is defined under a snippet name and has a prefix, body and
// description. The prefix is what is used to trigger the snippet and the body will be expanded and inserted. Possible variables are:
// \$1, \$2 for tab stops, \$0 for the final cursor position, and \${1:label}, \${2:another} for placeholders. Placeholders with the
VSCode Code Snippet.description: Some Useful Snippet Descriptor. Pass --desc <string> to set explicitly.
